title: Royal Cliff recognised as the “Luxury Grand Resort of the Year” by Luxury Travel Guide Global Awards 2015
text:
Awards Royal Cliff recognised as the “Luxury Grand Resort of the Year” by Luxury Travel Guide Global Awards 2015 Royal Cliff recognised as the “Luxury Grand Resort of the Year” by Luxury Travel Guide Global Awards 2015 Details Category: Awards   10:45 Recognised and celebrated for excellence in the tourism and hospitality industry, the Royal Cliff Hotels Group has recently been awarded with the “Luxury Grand Resort of the Year” from the Luxury Travel Guide Global Awards 2015.The Luxury Travel Guide Global Awards represent the pinnacle of hospitality achievement and pays tribute to outstanding properties that have excelled in the industry. 
The Royal Cliff Hotels Group is home to 4 award-winning 5-star hotels including the Royal Cliff Beach Hotel, Royal Cliff Beach Terrace, Royal Cliff Grand Hotel and the Royal Wing Suites & Spa; with each taking great pride in exceeding guests’ expectations while ensuring the most relaxing and comfortable stay. The property also offers guests an unprecedented myriad of facilities, activities and exclusive partnerships with leading attractions around town. Winners for this award are chosen after a rigorous assessment criteria identifying the very best in the region carried out by trusted professionals of The Luxury Travel Guide. “Providing our guests with a relaxing and memorable experience is part of our lasting and essential goals at the Royal Cliff Hotels Group.” Mr. Vitanart Vathanakul, Executive Director of the Royal Cliff Hotels Group said. “Being recognised as the Luxury Grand Resort of the Year reaffirms our ambition and commitment to setting standards for luxury travel in Asia and around the world. This achievement once again gives us the opportunity to showcase our dedication to guest-focused innovations as we constantly improve our unparalleled range of facilities and ensure service excellence from our staff.” Situated on a 64 acre private parkland estate overlooking the stunning Gulf of Thailand, the Royal Cliff Hotels Group has been honored with multiple awards and recognition from organisations of national and international repute. It is home to four award winning 5-star hotels offering a sensory experience defined profoundly by its style, culture and elegance - all presented with the distinctive spirit of the State of Exclusivity and Fascination.
